meanings.definition: The yearly recurrence of the date of a past event.
meanings.sent1: We always celebrate our wedding anniversaries with a special dinner.
meanings.sent2: Family and friends gathered to mark the anniversaries of important moments in our lives.
meanings.sent3: The anniversaries of our favorite TV show bring back so many memories.
meanings.sent4: The anniversaries of history are like bookmarks in the story of time.
meanings.sent5: The anniversaries of our first meeting are etched in my heart forever.

meanings.definition: The celebration or commemoration of such a date.
meanings.sent1: The town organized a big parade for the anniversaries of its founding.
meanings.sent2: Gifts and cakes are common during anniversaries of special occasions.
meanings.sent3: The anniversaries of national holidays are always filled with joy and pride.
meanings.sent4: The anniversaries of achievements are like milestones in our journey.
meanings.sent5: The anniversaries of friendships are worth cherishing and celebrating.
